text: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth.
author: Buddha

text: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
author: Robert Urich

text: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.
author: Albert Schweitzer

text: Your body hears everything your mind says. Stay positive.
author: Unknown

text: Eat to live, not live to eat.
author: Socrates

text: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
author: Gene Tunney
